featured.text: His flight was supposed to last only 15 minutes, so there was no provision made for him to relieve himself in the capsule.

definition.zh_def: 供應或提供的物資或條件，特別是食物或其他必需品。
definition.en_def: The act of providing or supplying something, especially food or other necessities.
definition.example: The organization made a provision for the homeless during the winter months.
